body:
@BarrySmith @sarich @tgamblin

Installing pflotran with spack creates three directories: bin, lib, and share.  It does not create an include directory, and the pflotran mod files are nowhere to be found.  Apparently pflotran creates the mod files within the src directory.  Pflotran probably needs to be patched to place the files somewhere in the installation directory.
title: spack does not move pflotran mod files to install directory
